name: Verse Token
description: Verse is the native utility and reward token of Aidicraft, Aidi Finance's proprietory NFT marketplace. Aidicraft allows users to create, mint, display , buy and Sell NFTs. Verse is designed to reward active platform users and incentivize active participation. 20% of VERSEâ€™s supply is allocated to support rewarding for AidiCraft platform users.
